House_Plants_Flowers.name: Mother In Law Tongue Plant
House_Plants_Flowers.discription: This is a picture of a Mother In Law Tongue plant and it does not require much care. Will do best in very bright light, even some morning sun. Mother-In-Law house plant care
House_Plants_Flowers.div: H O U S E - P L A N T S - F L O W E R S

House_Plants_Flowers.name: Pothos Marble Queen Plant
House_Plants_Flowers.discription: One of my favorite types of Pothos the plant pictured here is the Pothos Marble Queen. The leaves are colored a mix of white and green. Pothos are easy care house plants
House_Plants_Flowers.div: H O U S E - P L A N T S - F L O W E R S

House_Plants_Flowers.name: Dracaena Marginata Plant
House_Plants_Flowers.discription: Picture of Dracaena Marginata plant, a graceful house plant that will do well in medium to bright indirect light. A nice plant once established and free of any problems
House_Plants_Flowers.div: H O U S E - P L A N T S - F L O W E R S

House_Plants_Flowers.name: Aglaonema Plant
House_Plants_Flowers.discription: Picture of an Aglaonema house plant. There are many varieties and Aglaonema house plant will grow in medium to bright indirect light. Bright, indirect light for best growth.
House_Plants_Flowers.div: H O U S E - P L A N T S - F L O W E R S

House_Plants_Flowers.name: Peace Lily Plant
House_Plants_Flowers.discription: Picture of a Peace Lily plant. Peace Lily is an easy house plant to grow but will wilt quickly if let to dry too much. Will produce white spathes if light is adequate.
House_Plants_Flowers.div: H O U S E - P L A N T S - F L O W E R S

House_Plants_Flowers.name: Golden Pothos Plant
House_Plants_Flowers.discription: Picture of a Golden Pothos plant. A popular house plant, it will trail over the edge of the pot or climb a trellis or pole. Medium to bright light is best. Easy care house plant.
House_Plants_Flowers.div: H O U S E - P L A N T S - F L O W E R S

Care_House_Plants.name: English Ivy Plant
Care_House_Plants.discription: Picture of an English Ivy plant. I find it is much easier to grow outdoors but, with good light, you can successfully grow English Ivy indoors. English Ivy plant care
Care_House_Plants.div: C A R E - H O U S E  - P L A N T S

Care_House_Plants.name: Cast Iron Plant
Care_House_Plants.discription: Cast Iron plant can be grown indoors or outdoors. It will thin in indoor light but they are pretty hardy plants. I grow them on my porch and patio. They can be left out in the cold.
Care_House_Plants.div: C A R E - H O U S E  - P L A N T S

Care_House_Plants.name: Fittonia Plant
Care_House_Plants.discription: Fittonia houseplant is a creeping plant with leaves of white, red or pink veins and small white flowers. A pretty little houseplant.this plants makes good vibes.
Care_House_Plants.div: C A R E - H O U S E  - P L A N T S

Care_House_Plants.name: Planter Pots
Care_House_Plants.discription: See something you like? Ads are the only way that I can keep my houseplant care website up and running. Commission earned on sales.
Care_House_Plants.div: C A R E - H O U S E  - P L A N T S

Care_House_Plants.name: Nephthytis Plant
Care_House_Plants.discription: Nephthytis is an easy houseplant to care for and grow. Will do best with bright, indirect light. Will tolerate lower light levels.
Care_House_Plants.div: C A R E - H O U S E  - P L A N T S

Care_House_Plants.name: Birds Nest Fern Plant
Care_House_Plants.discription: This is a Birds Nest Fern. The leaflets that fall from many other ferns, creating quite a mess, are not present on Birds Nest Fern.
Care_House_Plants.div: C A R E - H O U S E  - P L A N T S

Care_House_Plants.name: Dracaena Janet Craig Compacta
Care_House_Plants.discription: This is a Birds Nest Fern. The leaflets that fall from many other ferns, creating quite a mess, are not present on Birds Nest Fern.
Care_House_Plants.div: C A R E - H O U S E  - P L A N T S

Care_House_Plants.discription: This is a Birds Nest Fern. The leaflets that fall from many other ferns, creating quite a mess, are not present on Birds Nest Fern.
